metadata.title: CVE-2024-38999 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: jrburke requirejs v2.3.6 was discovered to contain a prototype pollutionvia the function s.contexts._.configure. This vulnerability allowsattackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service (DoS) viainjecting arbitrary properties.

criterions.comment: requirejs package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
